title: How to Draw a Praying Mantis

steps.title: Draw basic shapes.
steps.content: Draw basic shapes. Add ovals, circles and lines. Don't worry if it does not look like as what you want. These are just your guidelines.

steps.title: Second, draw the head including the eyes and the mouth.
steps.content: Second, draw the head including the eyes and the mouth.

steps.title: Draw his two arms on front.
steps.content: Draw his two arms on front. Some part of the arms must have jagged lines.

steps.title: Create three diagonal lines for the neck portion.
steps.content: Create three diagonal lines for the neck portion.

steps.title: Now draw the middle two feet.
steps.content: Now draw the middle two feet. As you notice, these are much thinner compare to the arms.

steps.title: Add more lines or details to your drawing.
steps.content: Add more lines or details to your drawing.

steps.title: Then all your lines are done.
steps.content: Then all your lines are done. All you need to do on the next step is to clean up your drawing.

steps.title: Then here you go.
steps.content: Then here you go. Your drawing is done. Keep up the good work!
